Posts.Content: Apr 1, 2011 02:14PM ilchusband wrote: Hi suebak very sorry to read of your diagnosis my wife of 22 years was diagnosed december 2010. I came to this site for the same reasons as Healthy _future. And his experience is almost exactly like mine. I had always been able to fix things before and this I could not fix. Please be patient with your husband and give him a chance. I realize that you like my wife Are the ones that are dealing with this disease. But to see our partners go through this is emotionally devastating for us. I picked up the book they are referring to At our hospitals cancer support center during 1 of my wife's treatments. See if he will read it it will help or see if he will come to the site. It has helped me to understand and come to grips with what's ahead For me and my wife.
Posts.Title: Spousal support suebak suebak

Posts.Content: Mar 25, 2011 02:38PM - edited Mar 25, 2011 02:40PM by ilchusband Yan So very sorry for your loss. She is a lovely lady. My wife will not let me use past tense words. She says if her time comes she will always live in our hearts and mind. My thoughts and prayers are with you and your family.
